description.value:
This is used as the material component for the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.LNwBYEuenmDAa81k]{Astral Projection} spell, which cannot be cast unless this component is carried by the caster. This spell also requires a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.K11ImuPLA448mA1l]{Large Jacinth}.

This component is consumed by casting the Astral Projection spell.
